title: In Search of a Scenery I’ve yet to See. - Novel Updates
author: 枯れ始めの山茶花
description:
A girl who was cleaning her older brother’s room, who was her last family member, finds a diary.

Inside of it, the wishes of her brother -who was ill with a strange sickness- to journey outside were written.

After being left all alone, she decides to go on a journey in place of her brother, and make his wish come true.>
